body:
Hey guys, I have decided that I'm going to ONLY pvp with a pickaxe for one whole week! If you catch me and
I'm not pvping with a pickaxe.... tell me and.... You get to tell me anything. (Ok only one thing : Plz don't tell me to break any of the rules) No matter how embarrassing or stupid I have to do it! You can tell me what to do for one whole day!!

I just thought it would be fun to try this out and see how this would go :)



P.S. I said no breaking rules because I don't want to get punished by doing this.

I hope this will be fun!

title: If you catch me....

replies.body: Oh yea and pvp means hit you just because im holding out a sword doesn't mean im touching you
replies.body_tagged: Oh yea and pvp means hit you just because im holding out a sword doesn't mean im touching you

replies.body: If I use a bow that doesn't count ok?
replies.body_tagged: If I use a bow that doesn't count ok?

replies.body: Ok xD I'll be sure to stalk you and spectate you throughout the whole week
